message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DB 

This paper is about a topic modeling framework for text engineering, which involves natural language processing and information retrieval. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also discusses parameter inference algorithms and sampling mechanisms, which are related to machine learning and artificial intelligence, making cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) another likely category. The paper also mentions the need for distributed parameter storage, which is related to database systems, making cs.DB (Databases) a possible category. Finally, the paper discusses the practical applications of the framework, which could fall under cs.IR (Information Retrieval) or cs.LG (Machine Learning).
